remarks: If a function is integrable on an open interval, it is integrable on the corresponding closed interval.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ibliooicc.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ibliooicc.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ibliooicc.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( A (,) B ) |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
ibliooicc.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( A [,] B ) ) -> C e. CC ) $.
ibliooicc $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( A [,] B ) |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
